functionDecorators.name: isTrustedForwarder
functionDecorators.description: return if the forwarder is trusted to forward relayed transactions to us. the forwarder is required to verify the sender's signature, and verify the call is not a replay.

functionDecorators.name: onERC1155BatchReceived
functionDecorators.description: Handles the receipt of a multiple ERC1155 token types. This function is called at the end of a `safeBatchTransferFrom` after the balances have been updated. To accept the transfer(s), this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)"))` (i.e. 0xbc197c81, or its own function selector).

parameterDecorators.name: operator
parameterDecorators.description: The address which initiated the batch transfer (i.e. _msgSender()).

parameterDecorators.name: from
parameterDecorators.description: The address which previously owned the token.

parameterDecorators.name: ids
parameterDecorators.description: An array containing ids of each token being transferred (order and length must match values array).

parameterDecorators.name: values
parameterDecorators.description: An array containing amounts of each token being transferred (order and length must match ids array).

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Additional data with no specified format.

functionDecorators.name: onERC1155Received
functionDecorators.description: Handles the receipt of a single ERC1155 token type. This function is called at the end of a `safeTransferFrom` after the balance has been updated. To accept the transfer, this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)"))` (i.e. 0xf23a6e61, or its own function selector).

parameterDecorators.name: operator
parameterDecorators.description: The address which initiated the transfer (i.e. _msgSender()).

parameterDecorators.name: from
parameterDecorators.description: The address which previously owned the token.

parameterDecorators.name: id
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the token being transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens being transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Additional data with no specified format.

functionDecorators.name: supportsInterface
functionDecorators.description: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.
